column3: Perfect spot downtown for some grab and go breakfast in the morning. Very friendly small business with great coffee and quick turn around times. In and out every morning in less than 5 minutes. Covered pick up area in case of weather.

Best little place for a breakfast sandwich in the FiDi. Service is super friendly (unnervingly so considering where it is in sf), and food is simple and delicious. Highly recommend the giant corned beef sandwich, then skip lunch.

The croissant sandwich was very good, but beware of the price hike. It's nearly twice as much as some of the pictures suggest! Not such a good price-to-experience ratio anymore. Adding a recent photo of the menu, as of August 2021

Great place to get a fantastic breakfast sandwich in the Financial District.  So tasty!  And the hot chocolate and chai tea were amazing.  Wish I would have found this place at the start of my trip.  I would have grabbed breakfast here every day.  And the people working there were extremely friendly.

Last morning on biz travel and needed some Java and found this small little cafe.   The owner was super nice and explained how he researched the local SF roasters and chose the one he did before he opened.   BETTER than Peete’s and Starbucks.  $2.75 for a large.   Gourmet coffee with exceptional taste and flavor.  👍🏻
Coffee Is Garbage Not Sugar When You Ask For Sugar He Give You 2 Small Packs Only Egg Sandwich Is Good
Cute little hidden breakfast sandwich place! Highly recommend!!!!
Friendly and quick. Nice little spot and the coffee is good.
Great breakfast sandwiches, nice service, quick and easy!
Great little place. The prices are fair and the food is delicious.

Great place for a quick breakfast sandwich! I had the bacon egg and cheese croissant with iced coffee and it really hit the spot. I work in the same building so it’s really great for a quick breakfast if I’m running late. The staff are super friendly too.
Fast, no frills, and great breakfast sandwiches for on the go!
Great Place, small little gem around FIDI Staff is super friendly. Must try.

Super amazing gem tucked away in the Financial District with the most delicious and fresh breakfast options. You really can't go wrong with any of the menu options....and they do have something for everyone! Also the coffee is a nice dark roast. These are hard working friendly people running a fantastic cafe with just the right energy to start the day.

Not 5 star worthy, but good nonetheless. The food is fresh and the service is great! I should have been more adventurous but I played it safe by getting a turkey and egg breakfast sandwich on wheat. It wasn't greasy, and the egg was cooked to perfection!

The hype is real!  I've been staying at a hotel nearby and try to find a new breakfast spot each morning.  This is THE spot!  It's a small little shop run by very friendly and efficient people.  The breakfast sandwiches come out quick so you're in and out. There's no indoor seating but plenty of tables outside in the courtyard.   Simple.  Fast.  Delicious.
Bagels are on par with a cheap supermarket brand. Service is rude. The cashier insisted on entering the tip himself, after turning the screen away from me.

We picked up a sausage, egg, and cheese muffin and a bacon, egg, and cheese croissant to have for breakfast at our hotel. Both were very yummy! The lady who takes orders is the sweetest! There was a short line, but these guys are very efficient. Great quick breakfast find!

Line was out the door and for good reason. With an amazing selection of great breakfast sandwiches and fresh coffee at a great price point, it's clear this is a great local spot which keeps people coming back. They run a tight ship behind the counter with orders constantly being yelled back to the cooks and then out the window to you when your order is done. The lady behind the counter is probably the nicest person on earth. If you don't crack a smile when you talk to her, I would be surprised. Minimal seating in the courtyard but that's okay since it seems like most people are taking their orders to go. The bagel and lox sandwich was great!
Fantastic food and coffee. Great place to grab early morning breakfast. The staff was very friendly.
Walked here from Union Square area for breakfast to find them closed. Important info to post online.

Small little spot hidden by office buildings. great place to get some breakfast sandwiches early in the morning. The lady who takes your order is super friendly and they work quite fast.  They open early and tend to shut down by 2 pm. So, if you want to get a sandwich for lunch be sure to get there by like 1:45ish so they still have the kitchen going.

Was staying at Hilton Financial District. Wanted easy but good breakfast and this place delivered. Breakfast sandwiches made from scratch, full coffee bar, and great, friendly service. Definitely recommend!

What an amazing surprise!  This little out of the way walk up cafe is hosted by the most friendly and sincere couple, and the food is quick, affordable and great.  Forget about Starbucks! Go here for coffee and breakfast!

Ran inside of what seems to be a closet.  A friendly couple with delicious sandwiches and coffee for what only could be described in San Fran as "dirt cheap".  Ate breakfast here on the way to an Alcatraz tour.  It was a cute little place and I would go again.

Yum! Great little breakfast place! Quick, friendly, and great price. Perfect for me and my two young kids. Be warned there is only a little outdoor seating, though, if you are looking for a sit down place.

It is a small place but the food and service is huge!  Wow! What a find!!  The owner is so friendly and really cares about the product you are getting.  The bagel with smoked salmon was lovely. So good for a really inexpensive price.   We dont live in san fran but when we come back we will definitely visit cafe me!!

This amazing little spot was my go to breakfast place when I went to a conference recently. The folks were super nice; the food was really tasty; and for SF the food was super cheap. Good drip coffee too!

This place got good reviews so me and hubby decided to try. Small quaint cafe with outside area to sit. We tried there crossaint and english muffin breakfast sandwiches which were delicious! They were made fresh to order and very reasonably priced! Perfect for a quick yummy bite on the go! We will definitely be back!
the croissant breakfast sandwich was so good!!!

Very small place with only two tables outside but it’s great if you are in a hurry! The food was amazing! We had the number one with ham and a number four with egg and will definitely look this place up next time we are in town!
Great little place for breakfast. Tasty Breakfast bagel for about 5$, it's hard to find a better deal in the area. I was also impressed with the coffee, very good.

MMMmmmm. Needed a small, hearty breakfast within walking distance of our hotel; enter Cafe Me. Small kitchen serving delicious breakfast sandwiches is an accurate description of Cafe Me. Place is sandwiched in the middle of the building, a bit closer to Sansome St. If all you need is a quick bite, made fresh, and a cup of coffee, I recommend Cafe Me.
Everything you want and need from an informal  breakfast pick up spot. Most sandwiches under 5$. Great combos under 5$. Fast and polite service. This could easily be a part of your morning routine.
Good little place, cheap, quick and food was good!

I bought a lox bagel and they charge me for the tomatoes and cucumbers. That is standard on a lox bagel, not extra. Everyone knows that, I you want to make more money just up your prices. There is no need for hidden charges. And the lox bagel sucks.
Super friendly couple serve great breakfast bagels, crosisant and sandwich. A lot of business to go. Three small tables. Delicious!
What a great hole-in-the-wall! Very happy woman with a sing-song voice greets you and takes your order. The food and coffee are great.
A quick tasty panini with fresh tomato & mozzarella salad convenient to Union Square & Market Street shopping. Nice break on their sidewalk patio.
The breakfast bagel with bacon or the one with canadian bacon are good and cheap (food and coffee for $4!!!). The nicest staff around. Definitely will return.
Cashier was extremely friendly. I got a lox bagel (with capers and onions) and an iced coffee all for $6. I love this place.
Had breakfast bagels and coffee. Everything was good. They also have pretty decent chai.
Great place for a quick breakfast! Prices are very reasonable, breakfast sandwiches are delicious and the staff is very friendly and cheerful.
Good for quick/easy breakfast and coffee. Cheap for SF. Owner is nice but don’t get him started on politics
Do not try hot chocolate. It's watery and tasteless. We threw out 2 cups after just couple of sips.
I never review places, but the guy that works here is so nice, this place deserves 5 stars. And the bagels are delicious!!
Breakfast sandwiches on the go.  Very fast and friendly with only 2 on staff. I would definitely go there again.
Being a sucker for breakfast sandwiches, it is hard for me not to give 5 stars especially when they are fast, really nice and prices start around $4.
Staff is amazing. The coffee was just the way I like it. This location impressed me.
A cut above the average breakfast sandwich. Friendly and efficient staff. Only drawback is it can be slow at busy times.
This is a small place whose food b is super big on taste...I highly recommend you drop by and try it for yourself, I believe you will agree.
Clean, Honest and Quick.  Coffee was strong and good quality.  Great place for quick n go.
Beautiful little gem I found, can't wait for more people to find this beauty.
New favorite spot! Fresh, organic options. Thoughtful, kind people happy to accommodate my special requests. :)
Food is amazing, coffee is average.
Same price (more or less) as McDs but better food and support local folks. Nice find for this out of the.
Right around the corner from my hotel. Quick couple cups with one of my besties from out of state.
One of the best bagels I have ever had, coffee was good too!
Great food/coffee and such nice people!
I love this place.  Delicious breakfast food at a great price.
A Mom & Pop shop at its best; good food, reasonable prices and friendly service!
Excellent sandwiches and amazing staff. Can't go wrong.
Super close to my work great prices and so friendly. Love them !
Cutest coffee shop! Convenient location with an extensive menu.
charming place, the staff is appreciable, greetful, the prices worth the food, very homy and pleasant
Good service! And convenient for grabbing a quick breakfast on the go.
It's run by nice local people. They are very welcoming and hardworking.
Very nice people, good price, quick and we all liked it.
Great breakfast sandwich.  Little tables outside to eat at.
These guys are great here. Great food and coffee.
A quick fresh pick me up bagel on the way to work. Love it.
Good price, nice location, very kind cashier
Great food, fast service, friendly people!
Tiny, hole in the wall cafe with breakfast sammiches served by very friendly couple.
Cheap eats. Good treats. Nothing outstanding.
Delicious sandwich, great coffee, and extremely fast.
Super service, great food!
Great little coffee shop with some tasty breakfast sandwiches
Great food, fast, great service
Adorable little shop for the perfect breakfast pickup
...just ordering by itself is a fun experience!
Hot croissant with egg, crispy in all the right places
Get the lox bagel sandwich. Sooooo good!
Yum and quick when you got to go
Cheap, friendly and convenient!
Great bagel and egg!
Nice breakfast food!
Nice toasted croissant!
We need more of these
Nice bagels
Nice owners
amazing food
The go-to spot
Even after eating, it will be good to pick Ban Bo Dai.
Clean and very professional
Herbal sandwiches
